DOC.brief_summary: Part I : Survey Coronary Artery Calcification Stenosis Participants Different Glycaemic Status Aims : To evaluate coronary artery calcification stenosis community-dwelling adult different glycaemic status , use dual-source CT angiography ( CTA ) Study Subjects Methods : 200 adult normal glucose regulation ( NGR ) , 200 impair glucose regulation ( IGR ) 200 type 2 diabetes recruit urban community Shanghai , underwent comprehensive examination include questionnaire , anthropometric measurement , biochemical analysis CTA . Part II : Follow-up Cardiovascular Events Re-evaluation Coronary Artery Calcification Stenosis Aims Methods : To investigate development cardiovascular disease subject recruit part I re-evaluate coronary artery calcification stenosis use CTA 3-year follow-up To identify predictive value coronary artery calcification stenosis future risk cardiovascular disease possible development coronary artery disorder among participant different glycaemic status
DOC.brief_title: Subclinical Atherosclerosis Using Dual-source CT Coronary Angiography Chinese Adults With Different Glycaemic Status
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 40 70 year old 2 . Gender : male females 3 . Provide write informed consent 4 . Satisfactory compliance 1 . History cardiovascular disease 2 . Allergy iodine 3 . Exposure radiation within last 3 month 4 . ALT 100IU/L , serum creatine 133Î¼mol/l [ 1.5mg/dl ] GFR less 60ml/min 5 . Heart rate 100 bpm severe arrhythmia 6 . Malignancy , myocardial infection , acute hepatitis major disease
